snippet: The track star Oscar Pistorius’s displays of distress at his murder trial drew an accusation from the prosecutor on Monday: “You are not using your emotional state as an escape are you?”
abstract: Prosecutor in murder trial of South African track star Oscar Pistorius has him relive the final moments of his girlfriend Reeva Steenkamp's life in the fourth day of relentless cross-examination.
lead_paragraph: The track star Oscar Pistorius’s displays of distress at his murder trial drew an accusation from the prosecutor on Monday: “You are not using your emotional state as an escape are you?”

headline.main: Pistorius, Amid Persistent Cross-Examination, Testifies About Details of Shooting
headline.print_headline: Pistorius, Amid Persistent Cross-Examination, Testifies About Details of Shooting
